title: Anime GIFs summing up subclasses
body:
Vanguards/Wardens

https://media.tenor.co/images/c24eb71342ee3ac96aa786040c8e0a91/tenor.gif

"Just TRY and hurt me!"

****

Juggernauts

https://68.media.tumblr.com/4b88880f4f2ccc80a63d79c6ac0645ce/tumblr_o67x5tYqtY1rey868o1_500.gif

"You're gonna lose in the ensuing melee battle anyway, so stop wasting my time."

****

Divers

https://myanimelist.cdn-dena.com/s/common/uploaded_files/1460140013-9af557e16033fc5c19443f576cccb0d4.gif

"Run, run, run, as fast as you can, you can't escape me, I'm the mobile dash man!"

****

Assassins

https://68.media.tumblr.com/f3b64512b1660fe3050e09acdc61bb59/tumblr_nan8idGjdn1qzke78o1_500.gif

"Your screen'll be grey before you even blink."

****

Skirmishers

http://pa1.narvii.com/5634/3e817ed5c165ae21969a1c1419cc91dfb17caa69_hq.gif

"Because we spam our abilities!"

****

Burst Mages/Battle Mages

https://media.tenor.co/images/a5200ff8939402e4e2bbda3a8107d2b1/tenor.gif

https://68.media.tumblr.com/2eba58060897aafe20e277d0366c074f/tumblr_n3xr88NQS91qzd219o1_500.gif

"Magic for everybody!"

****

Artillery

http://i.imgur.com/gPnDyRQ.gif

"I'll blow you to smithereens... from a safe distance."

****

Supports

http://pa1.narvii.com/6091/6e5fc573c78a4c4184f8bc5f7985a98d661cd9f8_hq.gif

"You want them, you go through me!"

****

Marksmen

https://media.tenor.co/images/cfb7817a23645120d4baba2dcb9205e0/tenor.gif

https://68.media.tumblr.com/d027168d0ccaa3d99451ae14ba0dba7f/tumblr_olbodyrMOs1tc8982o1_500.gif

"Just wait till we get our AS items!"

(In the particular case of {{champion:202}} )

http://pa1.narvii.com/5741/decbced7a56c2d2ae753b41722d338473363e25f_hq.gif

{{champion:202}} "Gimme a second, reloading."

****

Unique Playstyles

http://31.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m26jlrE0Rs1qb24r6o1_500.gif

"We dunno, we just do whatever we want!"

Can't Lando the Brando.

{{champion:63}} Hm... what's a three letter word for... total d*ck?
{{champion:86}} _Comes bursting through doors_ DIOOOOOOO!
{{champion:63}} Hey, that works!
Sad thing is, it's not exactly wrong.

Whoops my bad, accidentally deleted the original post.

Anyway, a more accurate pick of a support & their adc:

https://media.giphy.com/media/shJph7eJ0UHrG/giphy.gif

{{champion:67}} Me want CS and Kills! Waahhh! _Falls to the ground and throws a temper tantrum_

( {{champion:44}} has his hands full trying to fight off the enemy ADC {{champion:498}} , her Support {{champion:497}}  AND the enemy JG {{champion:121}} .)

{{champion:44}} _Mumbling to himself as he smacks Xayah with his hammer_  (I swear she's going to be the death of me.)

_He throws the now-dazed Xayah at Vayne, so she can last-hit her and get the larger gold benefit._

{{champion:67}} _Kills Xayah_ MORE! MORE! I STILL HUNGRY!

{{champion:497}} Lovey-Dovey! NO! Kha-Zix, sic 'em!

{{champion:121}} I'm not your freaking dog! But I WILL kill him!

_{{champion:121}} leaps onto {{champion:44}}, and he leads him away so that {{champion:67}} can escape._

{{AN ALLY HAS BEEN SLAIN!}}

{{champion:44}} Scratch that. She WAS the death of me.
wouldn't it be anivia mid tho for the bird trio instead of a kha
It's beautiful!

3 TIMES THE PERFECTION!

NO
IT MUST BE 16
4 TIMES PERFECTION IS TRUE PERFECTION

If you haven't watched the show, I would highly recommend doing so.

https://myanimelist.cdn-dena.com/s/common/uploaded_files/1460139914-f1109b66f45c29d770e26da53e875508.gif
the fact that you combined two subclasses for one picture irks me to no end.
Couldn't find one that IMO, expressed Battle Mages well enough. It's not that I didn't try, just couldn't find one. If YOU have one, I'm more than willing to see it.

I did a post like this a while ago using nothing but dragonball. here is a link https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/GqzqQoB0-every-subclass-described-with-a-dragonball-gifs
You can harvest the gifs needed.
No gif for Controllers? I'm upset.

Alot of the "Magician" type GIFs I was finding just weren't filling the bill for 'em. I wanted ONE for EACH subclass, but I just couldn't find any that would work when you look at the champs in said subclass.
I don't see one that describes Kled. How dare you slander his authority.

A GIF that describes the High Major Commodore of the First Legion Third Multiplication Double Admiral Artillery Vanguard Company and his many other honorary titles? There is NONE that can properly express such majesty!

Tanks/Jugg/Divers are great, I really laughed, but I'm a bit sad you didn't find a more specialized gif for Warden and Vanguard separately.

Assassins/Skirmishers/Mages are fine, but once again I hoped for a special one just for Battle Mages, they are worth it.

I don't like the Marksfolks ones. Still +1 for all the rest ^^

Alot of my INITIAL picks for GIFs weren't showing up on the boards, so I had to substitute a few here and there. The Marksman ones that ARE there weren't my original picks, for example.

Couldn't find one that IMO, expressed Battle Mages well enough.

Wardens and Vanguards were also hard to find for, because I looked for "Tough, Manly, Muscular" or "Defending Others/Protector" type GIFs and just wasn't finding what I'd hoped, so I settled for the FMA Armstrong one.
i like most of those animes.
love the gabriel drop out saitiana best girl XD
